name: I am History
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

In this game based on the movie "I am a Legend" you will be in the situation where you, Zoey, must survive and find a way to escape from the city where you think you are the only survivor after there has been a zombie apocalypse in the whole world.

CONTROLS

Movment - WASD or Arrows

Jump - Space

Camera - Mouse

Pause & Options - Escape

Run - Left-Shift

Interact - E

Stab - Left-Mouse

UPDATES

Nothing yet.
